description: Agência Koko creative design system with 17+ slide patterns for dynamic presentations

patterns.name: Hero Slide
patterns.description: Dramatic cover slide with gorilla hands background and centered title
patterns.when_to_use: First slide of presentation, major section breaks with visual impact
patterns.example: TÍTULO DO PROJETO + Subtítulo do Cliente + Período: Data inicial - Data final

patterns.name: Content Slide (Standard)
patterns.description: Standard slide with title, subtitle, and flexible content area for text or cards
patterns.when_to_use: Most body content, explanations, lists, general information
patterns.example: Slide title + 3-5 bullet points or card grid with details

patterns.name: Metric Cards Grid
patterns.description: 3-column grid of compact metric cards with dark background and white text
patterns.when_to_use: Showing 3-6 key numbers side-by-side for quick performance overview

patterns.name: Timeline Pattern
patterns.description: Vertical timeline with colored left border, perfect for showing progression over time
patterns.when_to_use: Time-series data, week-by-week evolution, project phases, chronological events
patterns.example: Semana 1: CPA R$ 2,03 → Semana 2: CPA R$ 1,85 (-9%) → Semana 3: R$ 1,45...

patterns.name: Statement Slide (Text Left, Graphic Right)
patterns.description: Two-column layout with 50% bold text left and 50% supporting graphic right
patterns.when_to_use: Major insights, turning points, critical findings that need visual emphasis
patterns.example: INSIGHT CRÍTICO (bold title) + supporting explanation + pink-mouth.png graphic

patterns.name: Statement Slide Reverse (Graphic Left, Text Right)
patterns.description: Dramatic layout with 50% large graphic left and 50% bold text right
patterns.when_to_use: Most impactful insights, memorable statements, dramatic reveals
patterns.example: (Large loud.png graphic) + 'Google Search supera Display em 8.2x no CPA'

patterns.name: Section Divider
patterns.description: Clean 50/50 layout with large title left and computer graphic right
patterns.when_to_use: Between major sections of presentation to signal topic change

patterns.name: Table of Contents / Funnel
patterns.description: Funnel-effect categories with progressively narrower blocks for visual hierarchy
patterns.when_to_use: Presentation structure, process overview, journey stages, agenda slides

patterns.name: Emphasis Box
patterns.description: Yellow or dark box with corner-fold effect for highlighting key information within slide
patterns.when_to_use: Drawing attention to specific insight, important note, or warning within a content slide
patterns.example: ⚠️ Importante: CPA caiu 45% nas últimas 3 semanas, validando estratégia

patterns.name: Data List Pattern
patterns.description: Two-column grid with label-value rows, showing multiple metrics in structured format
patterns.when_to_use: Multiple metric pairs, specifications, structured comparisons without chart

patterns.name: Line Chart (Temporal Evolution)
patterns.description: SVG line chart showing evolution over time with 60% chart area and 40% insights panel
patterns.when_to_use: Showing trends, week-over-week changes, growth curves, temporal patterns

patterns.name: Horizontal Bar Chart (Comparison)
patterns.description: Horizontal bars with semantic colors (green=success, yellow=neutral, pink=alert)
patterns.when_to_use: Comparing performance across categories (channels, campaigns, time periods)
patterns.example: Google Ads: ROAS 5.2x | Meta Ads: ROAS 4.1x | Display: ROAS 0.63x

patterns.name: Donut Chart (Distribution)
patterns.description: Donut chart with center total value, 50% chart area and 50% legend with details
patterns.when_to_use: Showing percentage breakdowns, budget distribution, market share composition
patterns.example: Investimento Total R$ 300K: Google 60% (R$ 180K) | Meta 30% (R$ 90K) | Display 10%

patterns.name: Funnel Visualization (Conversion Path)
patterns.description: 4-stage trapezoid funnel with progressive narrowing and drop-off percentage badges
patterns.when_to_use: Showing multi-stage conversion process with metrics and drop-off rates
patterns.example: Impressões (100K) → Cliques (15K, 15% CTR) → Leads (2K, 13% conv) → Vendas (500)

patterns.name: Stacked Area Chart (Multi-Channel Evolution)
patterns.description: SVG stacked area showing 3+ channels evolution over time, 60% chart and 40% legend
patterns.when_to_use: Showing how multiple channels/sources contribute to total over time period
patterns.example: Conversões Google + Meta + TikTok empilhadas ao longo de 5 semanas

patterns.name: Conclusion Slide
patterns.description: Centered large pink title with yellow emphasis box containing final statement
patterns.when_to_use: Last slide before thank you/contact, summarizing key takeaways or next steps
patterns.example: PRÓXIMOS PASSOS + Yellow box: Escalar investimento em Search para R$ 100K/mês

patterns.name: Cards Grid Pattern
patterns.description: Responsive auto-fit grid of cards (3-4 columns) with corner-fold effect
patterns.when_to_use: Showing 3-6 items with title and description in structured grid layout
patterns.example: Campanha 1 | Campanha 2 | Campanha 3 (each in card with metrics)
